trans-unit.source: Renders the document outline for the workflow currently being designed in the workflow designer.
<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutline> displays a hierarchical representation of the workflow in the workflow designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutline> は、ワークフロー デザイナーにワークフローの階層表現を表示します。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> that retrieves a service object for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutline" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutline" /> class by using an object that retrieves a service object.
<paramref name="serviceProvider" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
The hosting environment obtained through <paramref name="serviceProvider" /> is null (<see langword="Nothing" />).
\- or -
The design surface obtained through <paramref name="serviceProvider" /> is null (<see langword="Nothing" />).
Activity for which a new node must be created.
Creates a new node for an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutlineNode" /> for the activity.
Calls to create a new workflow node for a given activity could return `null`, which indicates that you do not want to create a node for it.
trans-unit.target: ある特定のアクティビティについて新しいワークフロー ノードを作成する呼び出しを複数回実行すると、`null` が返されることがあります。これは、そのアクティビティのノードを作成する必要がないことを示しています。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutline" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
Event raised when the TreeView for the document outline is expanding.
The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> associated with the node to retrieve.
Retrieves the node in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutline" /> associated with the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutlineNode" /> that is associated with <paramref name="activity" />.

A <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutline> contains one <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutlineNode> for each activity a user adds to a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutline> には、ワークフロー デザイン サーフェイスに追加されたアクティビティごとに 1 つの <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutlineNode> が含まれます。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that represents the service provided by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutline" />.
Returns an object that represents a service provided by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutline" /> or by its <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents a service provided by <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutline" />.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the document outline TreeView needs to be expanded.
<see langword="true" /> if the document outline TreeView needs to be expanded; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: ドキュメント アウトラインの TreeView を展開する必要がある場合は <see langword="true" />。それ以外の場合は <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Called when the control is starting to update the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutline.TreeView" />.
Called when the control is finished updating the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutline.TreeView" />.
An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load" /> event.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutline.OnLoad%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutline.OnLoad%2A> メソッドを使用すると、デリゲートを結び付けずに、派生クラスでイベントを処理することもできます。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 派生クラスでイベントを処理する場合は、この手法をお勧めします。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutline.OnLoad%2A> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's `OnLoad` method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 派生クラスで <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutline.OnLoad%2A> をオーバーライドする場合は、登録されているデリゲートがイベントを受け取ることができるように、基本クラスの `OnLoad` メソッドを呼び出してください。

trans-unit.source: Node that was added to the activity tree.
Called after a new node that is not null is added to the activity tree.
Node that was selected.
Called when the user selects a node in the activity tree.
Workflow outline node that was refreshed.
Called when the node is refreshed.
Node that must be updated.
<see langword="Boolean" /> value that indicates whether child nodes must be updated.
Forces a node to be refreshed.
Refreshes color and icons of all document outline nodes.
Reloads the document outline control.
Gets the root node of the root provider.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" /> that is the root node.
trans-unit.target: ルート ノードである <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> control used to display the document outline
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> control used to display the document outline.
trans-unit.target: ドキュメント アウトラインを表示するために使用される <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> コントロール。
